text_section1.text: Robert Perry had unlocked the secret of the ages! He dreamed of the wealth of Midas... the power of Caesar as he drank from the precious cup! And he could not know that the water inside really came from...
The Fountain of Age
I've found it! I've found the fountain...

text_section2.text: Of...

text_section1.text: As museum curator, Paul Mansfield, shows a guest about his colorful den...

text_section2.text: A most remarkable den, Paul! But that ancient map on the wall... you haven't mentioned the story behind that!

text_section3.text: No... that's been a rather grim and personal secret with me for years! But perhaps it is time I told someone the incredible events that map created!

text_section1.text: Bob Perry, a curio collector at my museum, first discovered that map of Ponce De Leon's fountain of youth! But I had best start at the beginning...
Perry had three enemies! One was the boyhood chum who constantly stole the athletic limelight from him in school and finally...

text_section2.text: Ted Cotter wins! He's the national champ!

text_section3.text: He's done it again! Blocked me from reaching the top just as he used to do in college!

text_section1.text: The second hatred was Ramsey Lamont, the well known actor...

text_section2.text: For the last time... leave me alone, Bob! You're vain, deceitful and rude! I want nothing more to do with you!

text_section3.text: So she's left me for Lamont! Some day I'll fix that character... but good!

text_section1.text: Perry's third enemy was a wealthy unclde from the far west...

text_section2.text: You flew out here for nothing, Robert! You're a wastrel and a sneak! So long as I'm alive the family mining fortune will be safe from your squandering!

text_section3.text: You old goat! You'll regret not giving me what I ask for! I'm sick of the pittance I get each month!

text_section1.text: Robert Perry was wild with anger at his imagined enemies! Vengence filled his every pore...

text_section2.text: Working in a museum like an old man... surrounded by ancient relics! Some day I'll have my revenge against those who have forced me into this!

text_section3.text: That boy's not well! He's tense, pent up... I wonder what's wrong with him?

text_section1.text: Then came the day he found the map concealed in a Spanish statue...

text_section2.text: It's a map by Ponce De Leon... secreted in the statue! It's... a map of the fountain of youth! He must have found it! And only I have the key!

text_section1.text: He was like a man possessed! That very day he resigned and flew to the Florida Everglades...

text_section2.text: I'll be richer than Midas! If I can control the power of youth, all men will bow before me! I must find it... I must!

text_section1.text: Finally, after three days in the swamp...

text_section2.text: This is it! This is the spot marked with an X! I've found the fountain of youth!

text_section1.text: Filled with wild excitement, he pulled a cup from his pack...

text_section2.text: Youth... all mine to control! I'll just sip a bit to see how fast it reacts!

text_section1.text: Then, as Perry raised the cup to his lips...

text_section2.text: W-what's wrong with that baby gator?

text_section1.text: Why...
... grown!
I... it drank the water and it grew! Ponce De Leon didn't discover the fountain of youth he found the fountain of age!
All my dreams are shattered! Smashed! Who would want to buy old age? I - I couldn't sell this accursed water for a red cent!
Why... that's an incredible tale! Do you really believe it happened?

text_section2.text: Wait, my friend... that is not the finish! Had it ended with Perry there a great deal of grief would have been avoided! But... that was merely the beginning!

text_section1.text: A month later, Perry returned home! Oddly, he seemed friendly with his old pal Ted Cotter and challenged him to play tennis...

text_section2.text: You know, Bob! I really hated to see you lose the national title! But it had to be one of us! Glad you've gotten over your temper about it!

text_section3.text: Oh, sure, Ted, from now on we're friends!

text_section1.text: It was after the first set that Cotter quenched his thirst...

text_section2.text: Ugh! Water tastes stagnant!

text_section3.text: Really... perhaps it's been in the sun too long!

text_section1.text: ... And it happened...

text_section2.text: Ha, ha! What's wrong, Cotter? ... You feeling strange?

text_section1.text: Yes, Cotter... you're old! Old as your grandfather! You'll never defeat me or anyone else again in an athletic contest!
Robert Perry's bizarre plot against his `enemies' unfolded next at Atlas Film studios, where...

text_section2.text: All right, Ramsey, make the toast to the kingdom with that goblet of water!

text_section3.text: Yes, Ramsey... it's only water... not wine! Water from the fountain of age!

text_section1.text: Ha, ha! Now go back to the girl you stole from me, Ramsey! I'm sure she'll be glad to have you! Ha, ha!
The next day found Perry flying toward Death Valley! His vicious brain had hatched a final plot that could make him rich...

text_section2.text: The last bottle of fountain water! And it shall do me the most good! My uncle is already in his sixties! When he drinks this -- ha, ha -- how old can a man get and still survive?

text_section1.text: Suddenly, fate intervened as...

text_section2.text: Wha...? Motor's failing... got to crash land on the desert!

text_section1.text: Perry landed safely... but as he realized his situation...

text_section2.text: I-I'm fifty miles from uncle's ranch! I can never make it! There's nothing to do but wait and hope I'm discovered! But that may take days! I'll need... water!

text_section1.text: My emergency water container... it's smashed!
T-the only water I have is from... the fountain of old age!
Great Caesar! What did he do? And who was that figure just landed in the plane behind him?

text_section2.text: That figure was his old tennis playing pal, Ted Cotter! And after gliding down he remained unseen in the background until Perry drank the water!

text_section1.text: But now Cotter was young again! You see, he had had the water tested and learned its chemical effects only withered the skin and gave the appearance of old age for a few hours! Getting together with Perry's other `enemies', they rigged the desert plane crash to teach him the folly of hatred!

text_section2.text: The end.
